content: maui market bag crochet pattern by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful https //www ravelry com/designers/susan-e-kennedy @prettypeacefulcrochet on instagram pretty peaceful on facebook pretty peaceful youtube video tutorials size 11 diameter round bottom 28 cm 25 long including handles 64 cm yarn worsted weight medium category 4 you will need about 370 yards 338 meters of yarn per bag about 185 yards 169 m each of the main color and contrast color yarns the round bottom uses the main color yarn mc and the top and handles use the contrast color yarn cc the sample bags used 2 balls of lion brand 24/7 cotton yarn per bag this is 100% mercerized cotton yarn with 186 yards 170 m per 100-gram ball the pink/red bag used 1 ball of 144 magenta and 1 ball of 142 rose the yellow/gold bag used 1 ball of 158 goldenrod and 1 ball of 157 lemon the mint/green bag used 1 ball of 178 jade and 1 ball of 116 succulent the blue/indigo bag used 1 ball of 108 denim and 1 ball of 107 sky the violet/purple bag used 1 ball of 147 purple and 1 ball of 143 lilac yarn substitutes some similar yarns are sugar n cream cotton yarn lion brand pima cotton hobbii rainbow cotton paintbox cotton aran loops & threads cotton colors phildar phil degradé hobby lobby i love this cotton debbie bliss cotton dk bergère de france coton satiné tahki yarns cotton classic and karabella yarns zodiac use a hook size 0 5 mm or 1 mm smaller than recommended on the yarn label to make a strong fabric with tight stitches this keeps the bag from stretching too much when you carry heavy items yarn weight worsted weight hook size 4 mm us f for the bottom and 3 5 mm us e for the sides of the bag gauge 18 sts and 13 row = 4 10 cm in half_double_crochet in the round terms us chain chain yarn over and pull through loop on hook sts stitches single_crochet single_crochet insert hook into stitch yarn over pull through stitch yarn over pull through both loops on hook half_double_crochet half_double_crochet yarn over insert hook into stitch yarn over pull through stitch yarn over pull through all three loops on hook double_crochet double_crochet yarn over insert hook into stitch yarn over pull through stitch yarn over pull through two loops yarn over pull through both loops on hook pattern notes this pattern is worked in the round from the bottom up the bottom is worked in a continuous spiral without joining between rounds work is not turned after each round- the right side is kept facing up throughout the sides of the bag are worked in a continuous spiral from the base then each side of the bag is shaped with a few short row see the tutorial photos below handles are worked in rounds from the sides of the bag use the larger hook for the bottom of the bag
